Sentencas: We have fabricated a fuel cell based on a superprotonic conductor.
Titulo: Novel solid acid fuel cell based on a superprotonic conductor Tl3H(SO4)2

Sentencas: a Tl3H(SO4)(2) crystal, and have measured the electrical properties of this fuel cell.
Titulo: Novel solid acid fuel cell based on a superprotonic conductor Tl3H(SO4)2

Sentencas: It is found that the open-circuit voltage in the fuel cell based on the Tl3H(SO4)(2) Crystal increases by suppling H, fuel gas and typically becomes 0.83 V.
Titulo: Novel solid acid fuel cell based on a superprotonic conductor Tl3H(SO4)2

Sentencas: Moreover, we have observed that the cell voltage decreases with increasing Current density.
Titulo: Novel solid acid fuel cell based on a superprotonic conductor Tl3H(SO4)2

Sentencas: as observed in fuel cells such as proton exchange membrane fuel cell, solid oxide fuel cell, etc.
Titulo: Novel solid acid fuel cell based on a superprotonic conductor Tl3H(SO4)2

Sentencas: These results indicate that it is possible to use the Tl3H(SO4)(2) crystal as the electrolyte of a solid acid fuel cell.
Titulo: Novel solid acid fuel cell based on a superprotonic conductor Tl3H(SO4)2

Sentencas: In addition, we Suggest that the selection of the electrode and the preparation of the very thin electrolyte are extremely important to achieve high-efficiency of power generation of this fuel cell.
Titulo: Novel solid acid fuel cell based on a superprotonic conductor Tl3H(SO4)2
